Check description: On first app launch the application requests access to geolocation
The updated application retains settings from the previous version
After an incoming call ends the application preserves entered data
When the screen is locked the application continues running in the background
When a notification is received the application continues working in its current state
After zooming in on the map it can be zoomed out using a second double tap
The station card is closed by tapping the close icon
When long-tapping a station and moving focus to another station the station card remains open
When English is selected in settings the application language switches to English
When the “Automatic” mode is selected the app theme switches to dark at 18:00 MSK
When tapping the “Feedback” button the support page opens in a WebView
Scrolling is available to view full route details in landscape mode
